H1_split_answer1:
| Features                          | Functionality                                                                 | User Story                                                                                     | Acceptance Criteria                                                                                     |
|-----------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| User Account Creation              | Allows users to create and manage their accounts.                           | As a customer, I want to create an account so that I can manage my profile and orders.       | Users can successfully create an account with email verification and log in with their credentials.    |
| Profile Management                 | Users can update personal information and preferences.                      | As a customer, I want to update my profile so that my information is current.                | Users can edit their personal information and preferences, and changes are saved successfully.         |
| Personalized Shoe Recommendations   | Provides shoe suggestions based on purchase history and preferences.        | As a customer, I want to receive personalized shoe recommendations to find products I like.  | Recommendations are generated based on user data and displayed on the dashboard.                       |
| Loyalty Program                    | Allows customers to earn points for purchases and redeem them for discounts.| As a customer, I want to earn points for my purchases so that I can get discounts.           | Points are awarded for purchases and can be redeemed at checkout for discounts.                        |
| Order Tracking                     | Users can monitor the status of their orders.                               | As a customer, I want to track my order status so that I know when to expect delivery.       | Users can view the status of their orders, including processing, shipped, and delivered statuses.      |
| Secure Payment Processing          | Ensures secure transactions for purchases.                                  | As a customer, I want to make secure payments so that my financial information is protected.  | Payment transactions are processed securely, and users receive confirmation of successful payments.     |
| Customer Support                   | Provides access to customer service for inquiries and issues.               | As a customer, I want to contact support if I have questions or issues with my orders.       | Users can access a support section with FAQs, live chat, or email support options.                     |
| Mobile Responsiveness              | Ensures the portal is accessible on mobile devices.                         | As a customer, I want to access the portal on my phone so that I can shop on the go.        | The portal is fully functional and user-friendly on mobile devices, with no loss of features.          |
H1_split_answer2:
| Features                        | Functionality                                                                 | User Story                                                                                     | Acceptance Criteria                                                                                     |
|---------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Virtual Fitting Room            | Allows customers to visualize how different shoe styles look on their feet using augmented reality. | As a customer, I want to use a virtual fitting room so that I can see how shoes will look on me before purchasing. | The virtual fitting room should accurately overlay shoes on the customer's feet in real-time.         |
| Community Forum                 | A space for customers to share reviews, styling tips, and photos of their purchases. | As a customer, I want to participate in a community forum to share my experiences and learn from others. | The forum should allow users to post, comment, and like posts, with moderation features in place.      |
| Secure Order Placement          | Customers can securely place shoe orders through the portal.                | As a customer, I want to place my shoe order securely so that my payment information is protected. | The order placement process should include secure payment options and confirmation emails.             |
| Order Tracking                  | Customers can monitor the status of their orders in real-time.              | As a customer, I want to track my order status so that I know when to expect my shoes.        | The order tracking feature should provide real-time updates on shipping and delivery status.           |
| User Profile Management         | Customers can create and manage their profiles, including preferences and order history. | As a customer, I want to manage my profile so that I can easily access my order history and preferences. | Users should be able to update their personal information, view past orders, and save favorite styles.  |
| Product Recommendations          | Suggests shoes based on customer preferences and past purchases.            | As a customer, I want to receive personalized shoe recommendations to discover new styles I might like. | Recommendations should be based on user behavior and preferences, updated regularly.                   |
| Customer Support                | Provides assistance through chat, email, or phone support.                  | As a customer, I want to access customer support easily if I have questions or issues with my order. | Support options should be clearly visible, with response times communicated to users.                  |
